    Factory of AWT Robots.
    Author:
    Alex Ruiz

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Robot newRobotInLeftScreen()
      Creates a new AWT Robot object in the coordinate system of the left screen (in terms of coordinates).

      Creates a new AWT Robot object in the coordinate system of the primary screen.

    • Method Detail

      • newRobotInPrimaryScreen

        @Nonnull
public java.awt.Robot newRobotInPrimaryScreen()
                                       throws java.awt.AWTException
        Creates a new AWT Robot object in the coordinate system of the primary screen.
        Returns:
        the created Robot.
        Throws:
        java.awt.AWTException - if the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control. This exception is always thrown when GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless() returns true.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if createRobot permission is not granted.

      • newRobotInLeftScreen

        @Nonnull
public java.awt.Robot newRobotInLeftScreen()
                                    throws java.awt.AWTException
        Creates a new AWT Robot object in the coordinate system of the left screen (in terms of coordinates).
        Returns:
        the created Robot.
        Throws:
        java.awt.AWTException - if the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control. This exception is always thrown when GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless() returns true.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if createRobot permission is not granted.
